DOC.brief_summary: Cross sectional observational ultrasound study of transplanted kidneys and the carotid artery in consecutive recruited outpatients.
DOC.brief_title: Association of the Intrarenal Resistance Index (RI) of Transplanted Kidneys With Generalized Atherosclerosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients after renal transplantation with stable renal function Exclusion criteria: Known impairment of renal function (e.g. acute rejection) Known renal artery or carotid artery stenosis
